text: The Outcasts of Poker Flat is a 1952 American western movie directed by Joseph M. Newman and based on the 1869 short story of the same name by Bert Harte. It stars Anne Baxter, Dale Robertson, Miriam Hopkins, Barbara Bates, Cameron Mitchell. ==Other websites== * * Category:1952 movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Movies directed by Joseph M. Newman
title: The Outcasts of Poker Flat (1952 movie)
